Highly recommend Dead by Daylight. Wish matchmaking were a bit faster when playing as a survivor, but overall the game is a fun break from shooters and in depth RPGs. Play in the dark with your volume turned up to get the ultimate shit your pants experience you've been craving. (Not that I yearn for shitting my pants, but y'know what I mean.)
Боде мой, дбд, можно обнову без багов , у меня комп хороший 50 фпс в дбд и проц хороший , но какого-то чёрта зависает картинка с новой обновой уже не первый раз.

A good game that will definitely keep you entertained. If you don’t mind waiting forever to get into a game, getting dropped a few times in the process.   Please don’t get me wrong the game has a lot going for it but it has now been out for a while I would have hoped that long lobby waits glitchy gameplay and highly over powered killers would have been addressed and fixed  by now

Игра очень хорошая,похожа на прятки,правда в которых ты не становишься водящий,а становишься мясом для убийцы.Если вы хотити поиграть во что-то с друзьями,то эта игра для Вас.Цель игры-ВЫЖИТЬ,а чтобы выжить нужно сбежать от маньяка,полагаюсь на свою логику,ловкость и умение выкручиваться из опасных ситуаций.Смерть это не выход.Вы хотите жить?

Game is fun, but the bugs are unbearable, anti cheat does anything but and only prevents people from playing the game. Be prepared to reinstall repeatedly due to their "anti cheat". Killers pull plug on internet and you lose rank because of it(killer is always host no matter how shit their connection may be, and believe me it can be bad, or dont and find out =p). When solo playing theres a wonderful bug that makes you sit in the loading screen until you ctrl alt delete, which then causes anti cheat issues and loss of rank (happened to me numerous times which is why i uninstalled) extremely unbalanced killer to survivor, if the killer wants you to die, you will (given experience level of course).
不得不说这是一款很好的游戏。初玩觉得恐怖，但是上手后溜屠夫的快感，草丛中钻出一个光头，和水友和主播一起娱乐是其他游戏很难给予的。你可以带上工具箱拆光地图上的钩子夹子，可以带上针药秒模倒地的队友，可以带上意大利炮照瞎屠夫溜遍全图。希望不要因为改档和bug毁了游戏。毕竟BUG杀鸡
bom ams trava as vezes

In se il gioco è bello, è innovativo diciamo qualcosa che si è visto poco se non mai in giro.
L'unico problema di questo gioco sono I TROPPI BUG.
Cito solo il più grande ovvero il matchmaking, esso rende il gioco praticamente ingiocabile trova partite dopo minuti di attesa e a volte se non le trova si bugga e si è costretti a spegnere forzatamente il gioco.
Un'altro problema è che le partite sono ospitate da chi fa il killer, quindi se il killer ha il wi fi della metro di merda la partita lagga e diventa ingiocabile.
Ma la cosa più fastidiosa è che in 20 ore di gioco sono riuscito a rovare una sola partita come survivor le altre tutte da mostro o killer, poichè ogni volta che provo con il survivor il gioco mi dice che non trova partite.
Se risolti questi grandi bug potrebbe diventare davvero un gran gioco
很不错的游戏，越来越多样性，但服务器经常会崩（平均4天卡一回），希望服务器能够改善，还有就是人越来越多，套路也越来越不可预测了，这很好

Having a low-end PC, I always have to see if my PC matches the "minimum requirements" which it did in this case, but as I tried to play with my friends, the game showed me the loading screen which only finished after the round was over. Not recommended for people with potato PCs, like mine, even if it fulfills the "minimum requirements."

[i] Изначально хотел написать обзор отрицательным, но взвесив все плюсы и минусы он получился таким.
Я купил эту игру в начале ноября 16го года и сразу же столкнулся с рядом проблем, таких как:  оптимизация, большое количество багов, кемперство маньяков. Но мне понравилась сама идея игры - 4 выживших, 1 маньяк. Всё предельно просто и гениально.
Начну с разбора проблем.
[list]
 [*] Оптимизация. Оптимизация - дeрьмо. Неважно на каких настройках ты играешь, FPS всегда одинаковый. Да, качество текстур на высоте, но факт остаётся фактом. НО, на момент написания обзора в бета версии вышло обновление, которое, [u] лично у меня [/u], решило эту проблему,и в нём сделали игру более яркой и красивой.
 [*] Баги. Разработчики конечно же фиксят их, но тут всё как с Лернейской гидрой, вместо одного пофикшенного бага появляются три новых.[spoiler]  Разрабы штампуют платные DLC, а с бесконечной загрузкой в лобби уже полгода справиться не могут.[/spoiler] 
 [*] Кемперство. Очень распространено среди новичков и пидaров. Зачастую "новички" думают: "А как убивать тогда?". Да никак, лучше проиграть с достоинством, чем победить вот так. [spoiler] Да,в моём профиле написано "зафейскемплю за саботаж", но это уже совсем другая история ;D [/spoiler] 
[/list]
Теперь приятные моменты игры.
За считанную неделю я успел увлечься этой игрой, затянул с собой всех своих друзей. Работа в команде приносит неименоверное удовольствие. Бодиблок маньяка, альтруистическое спасение, тайминги на досках, каждое успешное 360º когда кажется что уже лёг,  приносят такое чувство эйфории, что не передать словами ;) , и все недостатки игры уходят в забвение)
В игре очень много приятных моментов. Порой открыты все ворота, и кажется, что вот уже игра закончилась, но твоего друга вешают на крюк, и ты, юный альтруист, не замечаешь как вы уже вчетвером висите на крюке ._.
В игре присутствуют 6 маньяков с уникальными способностями. В комплектации с личной стратегией игрока и хорошим обилием карт, это делает каждую игру непохожей на предыдущую.
Выдался плохой день? Повесь четверых и успокойся. В DbD ты никогда не заскучаешь)

If the matchmaking were better this would be my favourite multiplayer of all time. 

Essentially adult hide and seek, this game has provided endless fun. Since release there have been fixes to account for players manipulating mechancics of the game in cheap ways rather than actual skill or strategy. 

Playing as a killer is a good way to get to know the game and a good way to prepare to play as a survivor. 

The only niggle is the matchmaking which can through you inot infinite loading screens or match you with people that don't have a stable enough connecting. For some reason there is often one person who doesn't ready up before a match. I think they are in an infinte loading screen rather than not readying up. This means that when the match starts they never end up in the final game.

It is worth persisting to get those good games.

So I've waited until I got around 50+ hours into this game before giving my opinion.

Here goes.

This game is fun. It's a solid concept, well thought out. It's a nice "hat-tip" to those old school slash-fest horror movies. 
Beating the killer and making it out alive is a truly satisfying experience, one you will come back for time and time again.

So why the negative rating?

Simply because the matchmaking/lobby system is truly, utterly, hopelessly and fundamentally broken. Trying to join a lobby is a pain. I find myself crossing my fingers every time I click the "Join Lobby" button. Some days it will take me to a lobby no problem, but these days I might be able to join a lobby once every 8-9 tries. With the unsuccessful ones, it's not simply a matter of being kicked to the main menu. More often than not you have to manually kill the game in your Task Manager, as you are stuck with a loading screen that says "waiting" (my record was waiting 40min before finally killing it)

In addition, there is no matchmaking system whatsoever. Newbies are very often pitted against Rank 1 killers. 

If you can buy this game and play it amongs friends, it will be the most fun you will have. The Devs just seriously and urgently need to fix the online play.
Muito bom jogo, mas dependendo de seu computador não compre pois pode não rodar como o esperado

Used to be called "Waiting Simulator 2016" but now I enjoy it. The only part that is a bit frustrating is at the beinging of each month when everyone goes back to level 20, so you have people who are really at level 1 playing against players who are truly 20's. 

Game is fun, and the developers are always adding new features, and hunting bugs. I'd suggest getting the game, and waiting for holidays to purchase the DLCs.

This game has a great concept and it works well in how it uses said concept.
With that said, I'd ask that you not purchase this game because of the Matchmaking glitches that happen 4/5 times.

Example:
I tried to load this game for a friend and waited 15 minutes with matches cancelling or the game crashing in loading.

Also note that I held back on a review until I had owned this game for 3 months, testing it on and off giving it multiple opportunities to patch and improve.

My system:
100mb internet, Surfboard Modem, PC: Intel I3 6100, GTX 1060, 8 gb DDR4, SSD.
Good to my game

This game has potential to be an amazing multiplayer-only option for pc gamers, but the glitchy lobby's, overwhelmingly pro-killer maps and perks, poor point ranking system for survivors and underwhelming variation in survivor options/perks is what holds this potentially incredible title back. I'm actually over playing this game, simply because joining a lobby is so glitchy and more often than not fail-prone, that it's actually become unplayable. Not to mention the overwhelming killer advantage, no matter when the suvivor-killer ratio is, due to camping capability and no legitimate suvivor options to respond with. This game is going to die very quickly if the developers don't do something to fix the bugs and improper balances. As much as I want to continue playing, I can't take the imbalance and lobby glitch issues much longer. FIX THIS GAME ALREADY!

Mano, esses comentários negativos, são apenas para botar o jogo pra baixo... Velho o jogo é muito bom, podendo jogar com amigos, sobreviver aos desafios!

Velho, o jogo tem sim Bugs, mas nada muito prejudicial (Menos o da toolbox que buga no inicio do jogo algumas vezes kjkj)

Nesse caso de jogador ser o Host, velho, se ele kitar, ele é cuzão, tem caras que vão até o fim, persistem, jogam... SIM tem aqueles que tem internet movida a palha, mas cara, tem como você testas pra ver se a conexão está boa. Como? Vou ensinar: Quando você entra na fila, e entra num jogo que já tem o killer, digite no chat, e vê se tem delay, se tiver, você sai, não arrisque a conexão está ruim, se estiver ruim e do mesmo jeito você jogar, ai o problema vai ser somente seu, porque você sabe que está ruim o ping, e do mesmo jeito foi abusado e foi jogar... E se estiver boa, MEU AMIGO SE DIVIRTA, porque o jogo é muito bom!

Chame seus amigos, não ligue para essas críticas negativas, você irá se divertir muito!
New ranking system rewards campers. higher the rank the more they camp.

Dead by Daylight, oder besser 'Dead by Bugs'

Allem voran, intuitives Gameplay. Teils Drakonisch Schwer, was, meiner Meinung nach, auch nicht schlimm ist, da das bei diesem Spiel auch wesentlich den Reiz ausmacht.  Zwar ist das Gameplay recht Monoton als Killer wie auch Survivor, so sind die Phasen In-Game so aufgebaut:

 ->Spawnen
 ->Generator suchen
 ->Vor dem Killer weglaufen
 ->gewonnen/verloren

Zumindest sollte es so der Plan sein. In der Realität jedoch passiert es in-Game häufig, dass Killer eine Range bis hinter dem Mond haben, das Game lang unsichtbar sind (besonders lustig bei der Nurse) oder der Killer sein Internet durch eine Kartoffel bezieht, wo durch man gefühlt Stunden im Lade screen hängt, man in-Game zurückgesetzt wird und das letztlich den kompletten Spielspaß verdirbt.
Vorraussetzung für oben genanntes ist natürlich, dass man überhaupt in eine Lobby kommt. Im Normalfall (zumindest bei mir) sucht man als Survivor sehr lange nach Gruppen. Oftmals gibt es sonst Lobbys, aus denen man einfach rausgeworfen wird, der Spielbeitritt nicht gelungen ist, oder bei pulsierendem DbD Logo einen Blackscreen hat, und das Spiel nicht mehr funktioniert. So ist es jetzt zumindest bei zu jeder Tages- und Nachtzeit, was mir leider weiteres Käfersammeln verhindert.

Kurz um, DbD ist ein Grafisch sehr liebevolles HideAndSeek-Horrorgame, was leider im Moment mehr aus Fetzen zu bestehen scheint als komplett ist. Daher: Hände weg, bis bei DbD die gröbsten Fehler raus sind!

Refazendo a análise.
Pois bem, após inúmeras tentavivas de tentar jogar esse "bendito" jogo, consegui resolver o problema de forma parcial deletando a pasta EAC Anti-Cheat e restaurando a mesma através da verificação de integridade dos arquivos, mas enfim, vamos ao que interessa.

Pontos positivos:

1º: O jogo tem uma mecânica boa, cenários bem criados e é um jogo que exige o trabalho em equipe.
2º: A interação com o cenário também é boa, apesar de que mais coisas poderiam ser adicionadas para que os sobreviventes e killer's tenham mais opções para pensar estrategicamente.
3º: O jogo te dá varias opções de escolha de sobreviventes e killer's, sendo assim, o jogo não fica tão tedioso rápidamente, pois você terá vários personagens para upar.

Pontos negativos:

1º: O killer é o host da partida, ou seja, se ele tiver uma "fvcking" internet, quem sofrerá as consequências são os sobreviventes da sessão.
2º: EAC Anti-Cheat é um grande problema, pois diversas vezes preciso fechar o jogo e abri-lo novamente para que o sistema consiga validar o EAC. Como eu disse anteriormente, consegui resolver de forma parcial, pois antes de fazer o procedimento citado acima era impossível jogar, foram quase 10 horas de jogo registradas para conseguir jogar pouquíssimas partidas.
3º: Pelo que andei pesquisando no fórum, o jogo recebe pouquíssimas atualizações para correção de bugs, uma coisa chata, visto que ao iniciar o jogo você já se deprara com alguns, como: 
Travar na tela de carregamento.
Não encontrar nenhuma partida.
Ao iniciar uma partida, o jogo fica um longo tempo carregando, as vezes até perco as "esperanças".

Pois bem, particulamente eu gostei bastante do jogo, é divertido, o trabalho em equipe ajuda bastante contra o tédio, mas fica difícil dizer ao certo se compensa ou não comprar esse jogo, pois os bugs são bastantes irritantes. O fato do killer ser o host da partida é um dos maiores problemas, pois pode ser uma "criança" querendo atrapalhar, daí entra em diversas abas do YouTube, coloca inúmeros torrentes para baixar e entra de killer.
Um patch de correção está previsto para segunda feira 13/02, espero que pelo menos parte dos problemas sejam resolvidos.


[OBSERVAÇÃO]: Se você está com problemas para encontrar partidas após o patch 1.40, basta desativar o firewall do windows ou conceder a permissão para que o jogo use a rede, pois no meu caso não estava nem sendo avisado que o firewall estava bloqueando a conexão. 

Bom game a todos! :D

In 3 ore sono riuscito a giocare circa 5 partite: il sistema di matchmaking prevede tempi eccessivi e funziona male, si blocca; tra queste partite, solo in un paio di occasioni, sono riuscito a giocare con un amico (il caricamento della lobby si blocca, e per questo, siamo stati costretti più volte a chiudere l'applicazione forzatamente e riavviarla, o, peggio ancora, la ricerca di partite e giocatori da aggiungere al gruppo continuava invano per decine e decine di minuti). Il gioco di per sè è divertente e carino, quando si è abbastanza fortunati da giocare una partita, ma fino a quando questi errori si ripeteranno sistematicamente, resta ingiocabile: ho perso più tempo con matchmaking e caricamenti vari che a godermi il gioco effettivo.

This game is based upon 4 players being survivors and 1 player as the killer. It is a cat mouse game and matches usually last 5-20 minutes. Very exhilerating to play either side and enough content to keep it fairly fresh. I would recommend this game to anyone as I keep going back to it even after quite a few hours, and this is coming from someone who easily gets bored with playing the same game all the time. There is a stream of new content all the time and the game is constantly evolving and getting better.

However, keep a couple things in mind: 

1. As with many games, some toxic players can tarnish the experience. After a match is over, there is a chat room open as long as the killer is in the lobby (the player playing killer runs the server, more on that in a second). I advise new players to just leave as some people are assholes. Secondly, survivors that aren't doing well in the beginning will often just disconnect from the game, essentially screwing over the remaining survivors.

2. There is a steep learning curve. Back when I got into the game a couple years ago, the learning curve was steep enough, and it has gotten a lot more complex since then with a lot of new content and fixes. At times, the devs seem to try to balance the game more towards the high rank play, and not for the new players. The frustration will be real when starting out. Possibly try watching some streamers play or watch gameplay on youtube when you start out to get an idea of how to play.

3. There are no dedicated servers. Therefore there are some ways for killers to exploit this as the server is based off them, and sometimes even with good internet you will experience some lag in game.

If you aren't trying to play super competitively, this is a great game. Never mind the wonky ranking system or the eternal balance war between killers and survivors. Just play for the experience and you won't be dissapointed. Wish we had more games in this category but this seems to be the best steam has to offer for now. Still worth picking up.

Freddy is op. It doesnt matter if you're a low or high level, the fact that he can see your aura from anywhere on the map is just absurd. "Oh just wake up" news flash, thats impossible to do when Freddy is on your ass at all times. Even when you manage to get away and hide, he'll find you again in about 10 seconds. You have no time to wake up at all, so yes the nerf was a great thing to do. "Nerfed to the ground" oh please. Not everyone is a master at this game and can magically hide and stay hidden from Freddy. Freddy is built in with basically OP traits.

No patches, fixes, just empty promises from developers. The feedback system doesn't work at all - if you're cheating - go ahead, nothing happensm no one will ban you at all. Abusing game mechanics, and other stuff is your choice. If you're playing as premade 4 people - prepare to wait around 15-20 minutes to seach for every single match. Then prepare for awesome ping when you lagging at the server like a bitch(i guess it's too difficult to avoid connecting server and clien with high ping at the master server code). Сategorically not recommend at least until the developers will change.
Отличная игра! Открываем завод по производству кирпечей и бегом играть в нее - особенно против Майерса =)

- Si trova una partita ogni 30 minuti
- Se i killer hanno dei perk sbilanciati devi metterti l'anima in pace
- Gli hitbox sono esagerati e spesso i killer ti colpiscono in wifi (per rispettare le norme anti-covid)
- Il gioco è a pagamento e nonostante ciò hai 1/4 dei contenuti, il resto lo devi comprare
- Anche se stordisci il killer spesso ti colpisce comunque
- Esiste un "battle pass" che paghi e ti da solo amuleti da appendere alla cinta

9/10 gioco molto originale, lo consiglierei
